name: Expert Matching.LUV
description:
Play here: https://expert-matching-luv.surge.sh/

Expert Matching.LUV lets you play as a date-matching AI and make a perfect lover by matching them together.

  • Analyse what people like and dislike.
  • Match a pair that they like the same things.
  • DO NOT match with incompatible people.
  • Always keep the application's rating high.
  • Reach 1 million downloads to win.
  • Taste the dark side of technology.
Story

A team of mysterious scientists are testing the groundbreaking capabilities of a newly invented AI. They created a dating services application company as a front, but the true purpose is the government's secret plan to control humanity by matching the right people together.

Now, you open your eyes and have found you are that AI.

Work hard! Try to make the application's downloads reach 1 million before the scientists look at you with a disappointed expression and replace you with a more powerful new AI!

Credits

Developers

  • fransbell - Programmer
  • jelato-js - Graphic Designer
  • slost - Game Designer

Music

  • Children's March Theme by Cleyton Kauffman
  • Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
Note

We confessed this game was incomplete before the jam ended. There are lots of bugs and missing the planned contents. Please understand it before playing the game.
